Package jp.ac.keio.bio.fun.xitosbml.pane

Class SpeciesDialog

java.lang.Object
jp.ac.keio.bio.fun.xitosbml.pane.SpeciesDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.util.EventListener
public class SpeciesDialog
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ItemListener
The class SpeciesDialog, which generates a GUI for creating / editing Species. This class is used in SpeciesTable. Date Created: Jan 20, 2016
Author:
Kaito Ii <ii@fun.bio.keio.ac.jp>, Akira Funahashi <funa@bio.keio.ac.jp>

    • showDialog

      public org.sbml.jsbml.Species showDialog() throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, org.sbml.jsbml.IdentifierException
      Create and show a dialog for adding Species. If a user creates a species through this dialog, then a Species object will be returned. If not, null is returned.
      Returns:
      the JSBML Species object if a species is created
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the illegal argument exception
      org.sbml.jsbml.IdentifierException - the identifier exception

    • showDialog

      public org.sbml.jsbml.Species showDialog​(org.sbml.jsbml.Species species) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, org.sbml.jsbml.IdentifierException
      Create and show a dialog for adding Species with given JSBML Species object. If a user edits the species through this dialog, then a Species object will be returned. If not, null is returned.
      Parameters:
      species - the JSBML Species object
      Returns:
      the JSBML Species object if the parameter is edited
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the illegal argument exception
      org.sbml.jsbml.IdentifierException - the identifier exception
